thread.title: Outraged Citizens Call for Senator’s Arrest After He Makes Jaw-Dropping Confession on Senate Floor…
thread.title_full: Outraged Citizens Call for Senator’s Arrest After He Makes Jaw-Dropping Confession on Senate Floor…

author: Nickarama
title: Outraged Citizens Call for Senator’s Arrest After He Makes Jaw-Dropping Confession on Senate Floor…
text:
05:54pm February 7, 2017 Do you like this article? 
The California lawmaker who is behind legislation to make his state a “sanctuary state” just dropped a big bomb on the floor of the California Senate. 
Senate President Pro Tem Kevin De Léon admitted that “half” of his family is illegally in the United States. 
From Biz Pac Review: 
“I can tell you half of my family would be eligible for deportation under the executive order, because if they got a false Social Security card, if they got a false identification, if they got a false driver’s license prior to us passing AB60 (the sanctuary state bill), if they got a false green card, and anyone who has family members, you know, who are undocumented knows that almost entirely everybody has secured some sort of false identification,” he said in the video posted to YouTube. “That’s what you need to survive, to work. They are eligible for massive deportation.” 
So in addition to breaking the law by coming here illegally, half of his family has also violated the law by getting falsified documents. 
The senator is also admitting that he is aware of them breaking the law, but has done nothing. 
People were not at all pleased with this admission, according to Biz Pac Review. 
This is a lawmaker? 
Didn’t he swear to uphold the law? 
This lawmaker needs to be under investigation, and quickly… LIKE this article? I hated this article. I'm a liberal.
